description:
Hiya, the djinn who commands the origin of light and darkness, appears out of nowhere and attacks Flio. Fenrys is gravely injured protecting him, sending the normally peaceful Flio into a rage as he unleashes his own immense power upon Hiya.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikari to Yami no Majin Hiya
Hiya, Djinn of Light and Darkness
